articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Gifts to Delegates of Songjin Steel Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Gifts to Delegates of Songjin Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent gifts to delegates of workers and technicians of the Songjin Steel Complex.
					 The workers of Songgang established the Korean-style system for the production of Juche iron true to the great Juche idea, the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea calling for attaching importance to science and technology, thus successfully putting the steel-making industry on a Juche basis so much desired by President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime. 
					
					 A ceremony of conveying the gifts was held on Tuesday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Jon Pyong Ho, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and delegates of workers and technicians of the complex.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian chief
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian chief
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, and the New Year.
					The basket was handed to an official concerned by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Family of Korean in Russia
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Family of Korean in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Jong Il Sim, Korean resident in Russia, on Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Political Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Political Figure
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, on the occasion of the New Year.
					 The gift was handed by the chairwoman to the DPRK ambassador to Russia on Dec. 23.

articles.title: New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Il from the Military Attaches
articles.content:
New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Il from the Military Attaches
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the New Year.
					 The basket and letter were handed to an official concerned by Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Tuesday.

articles.title: New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Chinese and Japanese
articles.content:
New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Chinese and Japanese
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was separately presented with floral baskets by the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, and Kiyomi Shinohara, advisor to the Tokushima Prefectural Citizens' Forum for Japan-DPRK Friendship, on Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year.

articles.title: American Detained in DPRK
articles.content:
American Detained in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- An American was detained after illegally entering the DPRK through the DPRK-China border on Dec. 24.
					 He is now under investigation by a relevant organ.

articles.title: Photo Session of Employees of Songjin Steel Complex
articles.content:
Photo Session of Employees of Songjin Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of workers and technicians from the Songjin Steel Complex had a photo session with senior party and state officials in Pyongyang on Tuesday.

articles.title: Preview of New Feature Film Held
articles.content:
Preview of New Feature Film Held
						
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean Film Studio recently produced feature film "The Name Given by the Era".
					 The preview of the film took place at Taedongmun Cinema on Tuesday.
					
					 It was watched by senior party and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The film depicts the heroic endeavors made by the members of the youth shock brigade in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province, to build the Kumjingang Hungbong Youth Power Station true to the great nature-remaking plan of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Tonguibogam Widely Used in Modern Medicine
articles.content:
Tonguibogam Widely Used in Modern Medicine
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Tonguibogam, a book of Koryo medicine written by Ho Jun in 1610 has widely been used in modern medical treatment in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The 25-volume book consists of contents, internal and external medicine, various diseases, decoctions, acupuncture and moxibustion.
					
					 The part of internal medicine deals with physiological functions of the bowels and their diseases, while the part of external medicine gives information about external diseases and nose, ear, throat and eye diseases.
					
					 Contained in the part of various diseases are methods of medical examination, causes of diseases, symptoms, therapies and prescriptions of some internal diseases and data concerning gynecology and paediatrics.
					
					 The decoction part provides effects, indications and picking and processing methods of more than 1 400 species of Koryo medicines together with their growing districts. The acupuncture and moxibustion part gives their methods and regions for their applications as well as indications.
					
					 From olden times, such books of Koryo medicine as Tonguibogam have been used in curing diseases and promoting health in Korea.
					
					 Along with the development of medical science and technology, shortcomings and limitations of modern medical treatment have been revealed bit by bit and excellent treatment methods of traditional medicine introduced, with Koryo medicine drawing a great attention.
					
					 There is the Academy of Koryo Medicine in the DPRK and there are Koryo medical treatment departments at provincial, city and county hospitals.
					
					 They treat patients with cupping, acupuncture, moxibustion, finger-pressure and other methods.
					
					 In recent years new effective therapies and means of Koryo medicine have been developed to cure such obstinate diseases as spontaneous gangrene, bradyacusia and post poliomyelitis paralysis.

articles.title: Might of Korean People's Unity Fully Demonstrated This Year
articles.content:
Might of Korean People's Unity Fully Demonstrated This Year
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Juche 98 (2009) has witnessed the people of Songun Korea demonstrating the invincible might of their solid unity in a great onward march.
					 The Korean revolution has emerged victorious so far with the leader, the whole army and the entire people in perfect harmony.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the leader, the Party and the masses constitutes an eternal mainstay of the revolution which makes it steadily advance forward in any difficulties. The brilliant achievements made in this vibrant year have all originated from the great trinity.
					
					In March the Korean army and people elected General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and then to the chairmanship of the DPRK National Defence Commission at the First Session of the 12th SPA.
					
					 This shows to the world once again that the Korean army and people trust in their leader absolutely and that the integrated whole of the leader, the Party and the people will last long in the DPRK.
					
					 The servicepersons and people of Korea, with happiness and pride of keeping Kim Jong Il leading the revolution, have made a great leap forward this year, believing in their victory.
					
					 Typical of this year's achievements adding lustre to the Songun era are the successful launch of artificial satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and the construction of the Wonsan Youth Power Station, swimming complex of Kim Il Sung University, Kalma Theater, Taedonggang Tile Factory, Mansudae Street, Majon Hotel and Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.
					
					 A new Collima speed, namely "Huichon Speed", was created in the construction of the Huichon Power Station and a remarkable progress has been made in the efforts for putting the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis.
					
					 Many factories and enterprises have updated the production system to meet requirements of the IT era. In particular, the CNC technology has been fully grasped in the country and a steelmaking process based on a Juche iron production system completed, recording a signal event in the development of metallurgical industry.
					
					 All the above-said successes are what the Korean servicepersons and people have made with the same will and purpose under the wise and veteran guidance of the leader.
					
					 The DPRK will remain an indomitable socialist power forever, boasting of the harmonious whole of the leader, the Party and the masses.

articles.title: U.S. Policy of Arms Expansion under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Policy of Arms Expansion under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. House of Representatives passed the proposal on the fiscal 2010 defense budget which had been adopted by the Senate, thereby making it possible to spend 636.3 billion dollars for the defense purpose in the next fiscal year. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to realize its wild ambition for world domination at any cost. This is the reason why it is so hell-bent on the arms expansion.
					
					 By accelerating the modernization of arms and equipment the U.S. seeks to gain an unchallenged position in the military field and lord it over the world on this basis. This wild ambition of the U.S. remains unchanged. 
					
					 The U.S. is stoking confrontation and arms race for launching more wars at a time when it has become a trend of the times for the world to head for peace, stability, reconciliation and cooperation. This cannot be construed otherwise than an anti-peace action quite contrary to the current of the times.
					
					 Under the situation where the U.S. is threatening other countries, openly disclosing its scenario for establishing military supremacy, the world cannot but be embroiled in the U.S. strategy for arms race whether it likes or not.
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. is the chieftain of arms race as it is engrossed in carrying out its strategy for world domination in disregard of world peace and stability and the arch criminal disturbing world peace and stability.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks other countries only will fall victim to its strategy for arms race.
					
					 The U.S. should not forget that its spending of such ridiculous amount of funds for war and other military purposes only spawned a financial crisis and drove its economy to catastrophe. 
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that if the U.S. keeps pursuing its strategy for arms race and military supremacy defying the world's unanimous warnings, it will fall victim to it before any others.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to give up at once its foolish moves precipitating its destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Projected Anti-DPRK Ruckus Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Projected Anti-DPRK Ruckus Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are contemplating holding big "events on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the June 25 war" which will fall on the next year by inviting those who took part in the past Korean war as mercenaries and bereaved families from the U.S. and other countries to a "meeting" marking the day, a "party" and farces reproducing battles in those days. They are also mulling working out together with the U.S. the south Korea-U.S. "defense guidelines" within the next year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 This is an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK and an intolerable criminal act of escalating the inter-Korean confrontation and tensions.
					
					 Through these farces the south Korean rulers seek to extol the U.S. which ignited the Korean war and other imperialist aggressor forces and kick off the racket of confrontation with the DPRK worldwide while justifying their criminal start of the war pursuant to its war scenario. They are, indeed, a bandit of despicable traitors and warmongers. 
					
					 The above-said "defense guidelines" are, in essence, a dangerous document for aggression aimed at unleashing a war for aggression against the north under the signboard of "defense".
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the frantic moves stepped up by the south Korean warmongers to launch a war, inciting an atmosphere of confrontation with foreign forces quite contrary to the trend of the times toward dialogue and peace.
					
					 Their repeated provocations to the DPRK are as foolish as digging their own graves.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities keep escalating the tensions and the danger of war while laying a hurdle in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations through rackets of confrontation and war despite our warnings, they will have to pay dearly for them.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppets' Plot to Torpedo Process for Improving Inter-Korean relations Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppets' Plot to Torpedo Process for Improving Inter-Korean relations Censured
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The "Ministry of Unification" of south Korea was recently reported to have presented "a proposal for changing the basic plan for developing south-north relations" to the "Grand National Party". The keynote of the proposal calls for defining the "basic plan" as one "hard to implement" and modifying it in the direction of linking the nuclear issue with the issue of north-south cooperation.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: The south Korean puppets are going to formally adopt the proposal at the "committee for developing south-north relations" slated to be held next month, but this is an absolutely intolerable anti-reunification move. 
					
					 It is none other than the puppets who thwarted the implementation of the "basic plan" which calls for separating the nuclear issue from the issue of north-south cooperation and pushing forward both of them in parallel.
					
					 Having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations over the nuclear issue since they came to power, the puppets seek to step up their moves against the nation and reunification in the future, too, in a more desperate and vicious manner. 
					
					 As they consider the above-said plan as one of the hurdles lying in the way of pushing forward such moves, they are contemplating modifying it in the direction of linking the nuclear issue with the issue of inter-Korean cooperation. 
					
					 By doing so they seek to achieve their sinister purpose of escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen under the pretext of the nuclear issue and thus completely severing the inter-Korean relations and driving them to a more uncontrollable catastrophe. 
					
					 It is the unanimous aspiration and steadfast will of all compatriots to improve the inter-Korean relations as early as possible and pave a wide avenue for independent reunification and peace and prosperity through national reconciliation and unity, the commentary notes, adding that the south Korean puppets will not be able to escape a stern judgment by history for their persistent efforts to bedevil the inter-Korean relations quite contrary to the aspiration and desire of the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Intensified Int'l Solidarity with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Intensified Int'l Solidarity with DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have reliably defended the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country, foiling every vicious anti-DPRK move of the imperialists and international reactionaries by dint of their single-minded unity under the uplifted banner of great Songun.
					 Full support and solidarity of the world people with this heroic struggle has been further intensified this year. This remarkably shows once again that the world stands firm on the side of the Korean people.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 The world progressive people fully support the Korean people's just cause because the DPRK is reliably defending socialism and advancing along the road of independence and justice, not following any other country, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The matter of defending socialism in the DPRK is directly related to the matter of protecting the world peace and security.
					
					 If a new war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula it may exert serious affect on the global peace. However, such event has not taken place in the peninsula until now as the army and people of the DPRK have bolstered up its defence capability and reliably safeguarded the socialist fortress.
					
					 That is why the world progressive people aspiring after independence and socialism and loving peace have lifted up their voice of support and solidarity with the Korean people's just cause, watching the situation of the peninsula with deep interest. Their positive international solidarity movement gives a strong encouragement to the Korean people in the drive to build a thriving nation while defending socialism but a telling blow to the imperialists and international reactionaries attempting to do harm to the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people set store by the world progressive people's support to the cause of building a thriving nation and the cause of Songun revolution.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the government and people of the DPRK to intensify the friendship and cohesion and international solidarity with the world progressive people.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever work hard to prevent a war and defend peace and realize the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of global independence in firm unity with the world progressive people, concludes the article.

articles.title: Signature Campaign Launched by South Korean Council
articles.content:
Signature Campaign Launched by South Korean Council
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council for Solution of the Volunteers' Corps issued a statement on Dec. 24 calling for the launch of a signature campaign for settling the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement referred to the positive activities conducted by the organization in demand of a probe into the truth behind the above-said crime and its settlement.
					
					 It recalled that international organizations have urged the Japanese government more than once to fulfill its responsibility after branding the crimes related to "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army as grave crimes against humanity and  war crimes and the parliaments in different countries including the U.S. passed resolutions calling for prompt legal solution to the sexual abuses.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese government has still evaded its responsibility, it pointed out.
					
					 The issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army is an example of the gravest abuses of rights of women, the statement noted, urging the Japanese government to make official apology and reparation for the crimes related to sexual slavery and enact a law on preventing the recurrence of similar crimes, etc.  at an early date.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better drop their servility to Japan and honestly opt for settling the above-said issue, it held. 
					
					 The organization will conduct a 500,000 men-signature campaign till March next year in demand of the proper settlement of the said issue, it stated, calling on the people from all walks of life in south Korea to positively respond to it.

articles.title: Halt to Japanese Authorities' Distortion of History Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to Japanese Authorities' Distortion of History Demanded
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Peace in Asia and Education in History of south Korea made public a statement on Dec. 25 in demand of an immediate halt to the Japanese authorities' distortion of history, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 Referring to the fact that the Japanese government decided to insist on the dominium over Tok islets in the "instruction manual containing high school curriculum guidelines" on social studies in Japan, the statement termed it an outright invasion of the inviolable territory of the Korean nation.
					
					 Koreans can hardly repress the resentment at the Japanese government's attempt to teach even high school students distorted history and instill the ambition for grabbing other's territory into them in the wake of forcing such instruction upon the middle schoolers, the  statement said, demanding Japan make a due apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should discard a humiliating diplomatic posture towards Japan and positively come out in the actions to pressurize Japan to redeem its past crimes.

articles.title: Demolition of Concrete Wall Urged by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Demolition of Concrete Wall Urged by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea issued a statement on Dec. 21 as regards the lapse of 30 years since the south Korean authorities built the concrete wall in the area south of the Military Demarcation Line on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The statement pointed out that the concrete wall is a product of the extreme political plot hatched by the U.S. seeking to divide the Korean nation into two parts for an indefinite period.
					
					 This wall still exists mainly due to the interference of foreign forces and the south Korean authorities' policy of toeing their line, the statement said, contending that the world peace-loving people should lay bare the truth about the concrete wall and make a breach in it.
					
					 It called upon the progressive political parties and organizations and politicians to identify the concrete wall on the spot and media to lift the voice critical of the wall.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK Important Day Celebrated
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- An explanation meeting was held in Indonesia and film shows in Myanmar, India and Germany between Dec. 17 and 22 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The participants in the film shows watched "Arms of Korea", "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that Dec. 24 is a very significant day for the Korean people, adding: It is of very profound meaning that President Kim Il Sung let Kim Jong Il assume the heavy responsibility of the KPA supreme commander on this day, the birthday of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The KPA with Kim Jong Il as its supreme commander has grown to be an invincible army capable of defeating any formidable enemy, the speaker stressed.
					
					 The secretary general of the Union Solidarity and Development Association of Myanmar said that Kim Jong Suk's desire for creditable succession to the Songun cause of Kim Il Sung was realized and the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity as a powerful country to the world as the Korean people have held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the KPA supreme commander.
					
					 The Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il serves as a model of world politics, the secretary general said, stressing that the KPA equipped with the powerful war deterrent is the defender of peace and justice as it removes war danger and guarantees lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event held in Germany.

articles.title: Altered Trademark
articles.content:
Altered Trademark
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- One day in January Juche 94 (2005) leader Kim Jong Il watched products exhibited by the Rakwon Machine Complex.
					 Looking at a small oxygen separator and soybean oil extractor branded "Wongunho" that means assistance to the army, he asked why they had been given such a trademark.
					
					 An official of the complex told him that they had thought it would be good to brand them like that as they had been produced in the Songun era.
					
					 He, with a smile in his face, said that the products would be used in not only military but civilian sectors so that they could not be called aid materials. He then said it would be good to brand products in such a way as making their producers conspicuous. 
					
					 Listening to him, the officials of the complex came to know that he wanted them to make their creation better with a strong sense of responsibility and pride.
					
					 Afterward, the products have been re-branded "Rakwon".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia regalo a delegados del Complejo de Acero de Songjin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia regalo a delegados del Complejo de Acero de Songjin
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio regalos a los obreros y tecnicos delegados del Complejo de Acero de Songjin.
					  En pleno acato a la gran idea Juche y la del Partido de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas, los obreros de ese complejo establecieron el sistema de produccion del hierro Juche al estilo coreano realizando asi con exito la jucheanizacion de la industria de acero que deseaba tanto el Presidente Kim Il Sung durante su vida.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 29 el acto de entrega de regalos.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Jon Pyong Ho, y otros funcionarios, los obreros y tecnicos delegados del citado Complejo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Mahmoud Abbas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Mahmoud Abbas
  Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores que le dirigiera el Jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, con motivo del 18o aniversario de su nombramiento como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, del 92o del nacimiento de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y del Ano Nuevo.
					  El embajador de Palestina en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, lo entrego el dia 29 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Retenido estadounidense intruso
articles.content:
Retenido estadounidense intruso
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El pasado 24 de diciembre, ha sido retenido un norteamericano, que entro ilegalmente en Corea por la zona fronteriza con China.
					  Ahora, el esta sometido a la investigacion del organo competente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun repudia campana provocativa a la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun repudia campana provocativa a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 25 de junio del proximo ano, las autoridades surcoreanas planean una serie de celebraciones pomposas como el "acto conmemorativo del 60o aniversario de la guerra del 25 de junio", un "banquete de consuelo" y la reproduccion de los combates de aquel entonces.
					Ellas tratan de cursar la invitacion a estas actividades a los hombres y los familiares de los difuntos de Estados Unidos y de otros paises, que habian tomado parte como mercenarios en la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					  Por otra parte, se proponen inventar junto con EE.UU. la "guia de defensa nacional" dentro del ano que viene.
					
					  Esto deviene insoportable provocacion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e imperdonable acto criminal que agrava la confrontacion Norte-Sur y genera la nueva tension.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 29 y continua:
					
					  Los gobernantes surcoreanos, horda de asquerosos vendepatrias y maniacos de guerra, pretenden ademas dar dimension internacional a su campana de enfrentamiento con la RPDC elogiando a EE.UU., autor principal de la provocacion de la guerra coreana, y otras fuerzas agresoras imperialistas y justificando su crimen de haber desatado la guerra en adhesion a aquel.
					
					  La llamada "guia de defensa nacional" es en su esencia peligroso documento agresivo para provocar la guerra contra la RPDC bajo el rotulo de la "defensa".
					
					  La RPDC no tolerara jamas a los belicistas surcoreanos que estan cada vez mas enloquecidos por desatar la guerra fomentando el clima de confrontacion en desafio a la corriente de la epoca al dialogo y a la paz y en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					  Las repetidas provocaciones de los belicistas contra la RPDC no son mas que una estupidez que les conducira a la autodestruccion.
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas agravan de continuo la tension y el peligro de guerra obstaculizando con sus alborotos de enfrentamiento y de guerra la mejora de las relaciones con la RPDC y desoyendo la advertencia de esta, lo pagaran sin falta muy caro.

articles.title: CIERECO demanda desmantelar muralla de hormigon armado
articles.content:
CIERECO demanda desmantelar muralla de hormigon armado
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo de cumplirse 30 anos desde cuando fue construida la muralla de hormigon armado, el Comite Internacional de Enlace por la Reunificacion y la Paz en Corea hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion.
					La nota revela que aquella muralla edificada por las autoridades surcoreanas en la zona surena a la linea de demarcacion militar de la Peninsula Coreana, es el producto del extremo complot politico de los Estados Unidos para dividir eternamente la nacion coreana en dos partes.
					
					El documento apunta que dicha muralla existe todavia debido a la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y la politica de obediencia de las autoridades surcoreanas a estas y senala que los pueblos progresistas del mundo amantes de la paz tienen que poner al desnudo la naturaleza de aquella muralla y abrir un agujero en esta.
					
					Agrega que los partidos politicos, entidades y politicos progresistas deben ver con sus propios ojos en el mismo lugar dicha muralla y los medios de prensa deben elevar las voces de condenacion a esta muralla.
